name: Shresth Sharma
description: Our official vibe check for all things creative. We let him lead because he makes sure we look good.

name: Garvit Sharma
description: Blender wizard who can make anything in 3D. Yeah, he also designed our club tee, so you're welcome.

name: Venkatesh Kumar
description: The one who actually works behind the scenes and gets stuff done. Someone has to snap all the pics, right?

name: Shreya Bhatt
description: Full of bright ideas and sunshine. We let her handle things because she's also a pro at giving speeches.

name: Chhayansh Porwal
description: The brain behind all the fun. He's also the guy we send out to control the crowd when things get crazy.

name: Vinayak Sharma
description: The wordsmith and editing guru. He's the reason our freshers' intro video looks decent.

name: Paras Sharma
description: Our enthusiastic shutterbug who somehow also makes sure events don't fall apart. Multi-talented, we guess.

name: Garvit Bhojak
description: A creative powerhouse who can design eye-catching graphics and also take pretty good photos. No, we're not surprised either.

name: Abhinav Sharma
description: The tech whiz who built this awesome website. We try to keep him around for the good ideas he sometimes has.

name: Aditya Ladrecha
description: Our resident cool guy who's a pro at video editing and graphic design. We're pretty sure he has a fan club.

name: Aditya Raj
description: A talented video editor who can also dance. We don't get it either, but we're not complaining.

name: Varun Kardam
description: Super talented photographer. He's the one who filled our gallery with all the good shots.

name: Ashish Singhodiya
description: Our go-to guy behind the camera. He can work magic with Photoshop, which we definitely needed.

name: Nandini
description: Our awesome idea machine. We let her take photos because she's too good at coming up with stuff.

name: Tapendra Nagar
description: Our keen-eyed photographer who's always ready to capture the perfect moment. It's his one job, and he's good at it.

name: Raman Rai
description: The idea guru who learns from the past to make our future events better. We're glad someone's thinking about it.
